archimate:Requirement.name: 4.67.2 NTP
archimate:Requirement.documentation: d) use a consistent, trusted date and time source to ensure event logs use accurate timestamps (e.g. using the Network Time Protocol (NTP), supported by GPS, atomic clocks or approved time servers on the internet). Use a consistent, trusted date and time source to ensure event logs use accurate timestamps (e.g. using the Network Time Protocol (NTP), supported by GPS, atomic clocks or approved time servers on the internet).
